A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi does a lot of things amazingly right\, and a few things very wrong. We left Star Wars: The Force Awakens feeling excited for more Star Wars\, but longing for something different. The Last Jedi delivers on that with a groundbreaking new direction for a Star Wars film. Sure\, it has many speed bumps and hiccups along the way\, but it will definitely be remembered as a Star Wars movie that changed the franchise. Whether for better or worse\, only time will tell.
